p:
DENV serotype 1 isolated in cell culture from a dengue patient, as previously described,
12 was 10-fold serial-diluted using Minimum Essential Media (MEM, Gibco, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA). Three consecutive dilutions (“high titer” = H, “medium titer” = M, and “low titer” = L) were selected based on preliminary testing on RDTs. The dilution “L” was the last dilution with detactable RNA purified from RDT.
